topInfoSection.description: Appropriately embrace transparent materials via turnkey niche markets.

alwaysLaughSection.heading: Always Laugh Whenever It's Possible
alwaysLaughSection.description: We also offer treatments that improve the appearance of your smile giving you the confidence boost you deserve. The process or our treatment below.

laserTechnology.title: Laser Technology
laserTechnology.description: The world's most advanced diode laser technology. Your treatment experience will be relaxing and smooth.

painlessInjection.title: Painless Injection
painlessInjection.description: The only dental clinic in New York, USA, using a painless injection system. You will be amazed!

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.description: Over 30 years of experience in implantology with specialized care. You can chew properly again!

3dDentalScanner.title: 3D Dental Scanner
3dDentalScanner.description: One of the most advanced 3D dental scanners in the world with automatic scanning, unique in New York!

digitalSmileDesign.title: Digital Smile Design
digitalSmileDesign.description: We help redesign your smile and shape your teeth to create a custom smile for your face!

crownAndBridge.title: Crown and Bridge
crownAndBridge.description: Transform your dark gums into a pinkish color with painless laser treatment in a single session.

brightYourSmileSection.heading: Let Us Brighten Your Smile!
brightYourSmileSection.description: Helping patients achieve good dental health & beautiful smile is a privilege & responsibility. For over 30 years, we proudly provided the best dental experience in New York. Our comfort-first approach is designed to meet the needs of you & your entire family.

historySection.heading: Our Glorious
historySection.title: Our history
historySection.description: Dentics is a well-known name in dental and oral care in New York. The journey of this institution started in 1990 under the hands of Dr. Jonathon Doe, Gold Medalist of Harvard University. Dentics dental center has been leading the way in dental treatment in USA for more than 30 years in keeping with the evolution of time and the modernization of the era.

reviewsSection.author: Samantha Payne
reviewsSection.title: What our clients say about us
reviewsSection.review: I've seen a lot of Dentists over my lifetime because I've had some serious dental issues. But my highest praise goes to Dr. Jonathon Doe and his staff. I was always very anxious going to the dentist but this time at Digital Implant, my experience was so painless and relaxed, there was no discomfort whatsoever.
